analysis.description:

	- acceptOwnership (/unique_chucks/21/0xd56e07e654f88d411dc5e63980fe555ed80d4876.sol#116-123)

Ownable.newOwner should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0xd56e07e654f88d411dc5e63980fe555ed80d4876.sol#90)
